item.title: Computer and Digital Literacies Workshop Plan
item.description: Introduction Hello! Welcome to the digital literacies workshop plan. I'm very excited to be writing this and planning this out, and I hope you get some value out of it. Most of what I'd like to write in this introduction has been moved to the Why and Workshop Philosophy sections, I recommend you check those out if you're either self-teaching or facilitating a workshop. Otherwise simply use the table of contents or scroll down to browse through the activities and get started :).
